com.amplifyframework.datastore

Class DataStoreConfiguration.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amplifyframework.datastore.DataStoreConfiguration.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    DataStoreConfiguration

    public static final class DataStoreConfiguration.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
    Builds instances of AWSDataStorePlugin by providing a variety of configuration methods.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DataStoreConfiguration build()
      Builds a DataStoreConfiguration from the provided options.
      DataStoreConfiguration.Builder conflictHandler(DataStoreConflictHandler conflictHandler)
      A handler that will be invoked whenever there is a conflict between two model instances, one in the local store, and one from the remote server, as received from a sync operation.
      DataStoreConfiguration.Builder errorHandler(DataStoreErrorHandler errorHandler)
      Sets a handler function to be applied when the DataStore encounters an unrecoverable error in one of its ongoing background operations (model synchronization).
      DataStoreConfiguration.Builder syncExpression(java.lang.Class<? extends Model> modelClass, DataStoreSyncExpression syncExpression)
      Sets a sync expression for a particular model to filter which data is synced locally.
      DataStoreConfiguration.Builder syncInterval(long duration, java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit timeUnit)
      Sets the duration of time after which delta syncs will not be preferred over base syncs.
      DataStoreConfiguration.Builder syncMaxRecords(java.lang.Integer syncMaxRecords)
      Sets the maximum number of records, from the server, to process from a sync operation.
      DataStoreConfiguration.Builder syncPageSize(java.lang.Integer syncPageSize)
      Sets the number of items requested in each page of sync results.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • conflictHandler

        public DataStoreConfiguration.Builder conflictHandler(DataStoreConflictHandler conflictHandler)
        A handler that will be invoked whenever there is a conflict between two model instances, one in the local store, and one from the remote server, as received from a sync operation.
        Parameters:
        conflictHandler - A handler to invoke upon sync conflicts
        Returns:
        Current builder

      • errorHandler

        public DataStoreConfiguration.Builder errorHandler(DataStoreErrorHandler errorHandler)
        Sets a handler function to be applied when the DataStore encounters an unrecoverable error in one of its ongoing background operations (model synchronization).
        Parameters:
        errorHandler - A handler for unrecoverable background errors
        Returns:
        Current builder instance

      • syncInterval

        public DataStoreConfiguration.Builder syncInterval(long duration,
                                                   java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit timeUnit)
        Sets the duration of time after which delta syncs will not be preferred over base syncs.
        Parameters:
        duration - The amount of time that must elapse for delta syncs to not be considered
        timeUnit - The time unit of the duration field
        Returns:
        Current builder instance

      • syncMaxRecords

        public DataStoreConfiguration.Builder syncMaxRecords(java.lang.Integer syncMaxRecords)
        Sets the maximum number of records, from the server, to process from a sync operation.
        Parameters:
        syncMaxRecords - Max number of records client will consumer from server at one time
        Returns:
        Current builder instance

      • syncPageSize

        public DataStoreConfiguration.Builder syncPageSize(java.lang.Integer syncPageSize)
        Sets the number of items requested in each page of sync results.
        Parameters:
        syncPageSize - Number of items requested per page in sync operation
        Returns:
        Current builder

      • syncExpression

        public DataStoreConfiguration.Builder syncExpression(java.lang.Class<? extends Model> modelClass,
                                                     DataStoreSyncExpression syncExpression)
        Sets a sync expression for a particular model to filter which data is synced locally. The expression is evaluated each time DataStore is started. The QueryPredicate is applied on both sync and subscriptions.
        Parameters:
        modelClass - the model class for which the filter applies
        syncExpression - DataStoreSyncExpression that should be used to filter the data that is synced.
        Returns:
        Current builder

      • build

        public DataStoreConfiguration build()
                             throws DataStoreException
        Builds a DataStoreConfiguration from the provided options.
        Returns:
        A new DataStoreConfiguration.
        Throws:
        DataStoreException - thrown if it's unable to parse the provided JSON or an invalid value if provided.
